doe resolves issues with royal dutch unit the energy department said it had approved in final form an agreement that resolves all remaining issues with shell oil co over oil pricing and allocation controls that ended in 1981
under the agreement, the royal dutch/shell group unit agreed to pay 20 million dollars to settle refiner pricing issues and 160 million dollars to settle crude oil pricing issues, doe said
doe said that before making the pact final, it modified it to reflect shell's compliance with the tertiary incentive program, a provision not in the version published last dec 31

under the january contract aramco was to purchase 1.34 million bpd for the four partners allocated among them as exxon corp 440,000 bpd, texaco inc 350,000 bpd, mobil corp and chevron corp 550,000 bpd between them

santos to acquire total exploration australia santos ltd said it would buy total exploration australia pty ltd from total holdings australia pty ltd, a wholly-owned subsidiary of total-cie francaise des petroles
total exploration had interests ranging from 18.75 to 25 % in four blocks in permit atp259p in south-west queensland, santos said in a statement
the santos group stakes will rise to between 52.5 and 70 % of the four atp259p blocks as a result of the purchase
santos said a number of oil and gas fields have been discovered in the total exploration areas and that it regards them as having very good prospects for further discoveries
the acquisition is the latest in a series by santos as part of a program to expand from its origins in the south australian cooper basin
according to the state oil firm, ecopetrol, the eln carried out 72 attacks on petroleum pipelines between 1984 and 1986
shell canada raises crude oil posting 32 canadian cts/bbl shell canada raises crude oil posting 32 canadian cts/bbl

shell canada raises crude 32 cts canadian shell canada, whose majority interest is owned by the royal dutch/shell group of companies, raised the postings of light sweet and sour crude oil from edmonton/swann hills 32 canadian cts a barrel, effective today
the royal dtuch/shell group owns 72 % of shell canada and public shareholders, primarily canadian, own the remaining 28 % of the company, a shell canada spokesman said
santos says it has significant oil find santos ltd said it had made a significant oil discovery at its mawson one well in the moomba block of the cooper basin, south australia
santos said the well was cased and suspended pending further evaluation
santos has a 60 % stake in the block, delhi petroleum pty ltd has 30 % and south australian oil and gas corp pty ltd has 10 %

chevron n.sea find may hold 300 million bbls -analysts a north sea oil find announced by chevron corp's chevron exploration north sea ltd may indicate a new field with recoverable crude oil reserves of 300 million barrels, industry analysts said
chevron said a sidetrack well on block 16/26 on the u.k
however, chevron officials declined to comment on the analysts' reserve estimates
chevron operates the block on behalf of 16 companies which include british petroleum development ltd, dsm hydrocarbons ltd, enterprise oil ltd, marathon int

ecuador to produce above opec quota - minister ecuador will produce crude oil in excess of its 221,000-bpd opec quota during the second half of this year, energy minister fernando santos alvite told a news conference
santos said the move had been explained to fellow opec members during last week's meeting in vienna, when an increase in ecuador's quota to 221,000 bpd from 210,000 was approved
while its production was down, venezuela, nigeria and kuwait loaned ecuador a total 12 million barrels of crude and four million barrels of products, santos said
bp petroleum development norway ltd, operator of the ula field, said september output rose to 86,727 bpd after dropping to 27,237 bpd in august because of the shutdown
some gulf sea captains were reported to be steering well clear of iran's silkworm missiles, however, and frontline emirate kuwait redeployed air defences to counter the threat

bp does not plan to hike standard bid british petroleum co plc does not intend to raise the price of its planned 70 dollar per share offer for the publicly held 45 % of standard oil co, bp managing director david simon said
bp now owns 55 % of standard's stock

simon said bp had carefully considered the amount of its planned bid and he quoted an oil analyst, whom he would not identify, as saying bp's careful evaluation means the company is not going to raise its offer
another official declined to speculate under what circumstances bp might raise its bid

the bp official said the 70 dollars a share offer is 7.2 times standard's 1986 cash flow and 56 % above an independent evaluation of the company's assets, including the value of its oil, natural gas liquids and natural gas reserves
he said the price royal dutch/shell group paid for publicly held shell oil co shares in 1985 was 5.1 times cash flow
the bp official also said the 70 dollar bid is a 40 % premium over standard's stock price over the past year
bp group treasurer rodney chase said more than half to as much as two-third's of the 7.4 billion dollars bp needs for its offer will come from existing sources
bp will draw in cash from its operating companies around the world and is also arranging a five billion dollar line of credit, he explained
he said bp does not expect any regulatory problems that would delay completion of the acquisition

caltex raises singapore oil product prices caltex petroleum corp, a joint venture between chevron corp and texaco inc, said it raised posted prices for several petroleum products in singapore, effective today

santos to acquire total exploration australia santos ltd said it would buy total exploration australia pty ltd from total holdings australia pty ltd, a wholly-owned subsidiary of total-cie francaise des petroles
total exploration had interests ranging from 18.75 to 25 % in four blocks in permit atp259p in south-west queensland, santos said in a statement
the santos group stakes will rise to between 52.5 and 70 % of the four atp259p blocks as a result of the purchase
santos said a number of oil and gas fields have been discovered in the total exploration areas and that it regards them as having very good prospects for further discoveries
the acquisition is the latest in a series by santos as part of a program to expand from its origins in the south australian cooper basin

brooklyn union to buy gas from shell oil brooklyn union gas co said it has contracted to purchase up to 60 million cubic feet of natural gas per day from shell oil co, a royal dutch/shell group subsidiary
a spokesman said shell and the utility agreed to not disclose the length of the contract or the price of the gas, which he described as competitive with a market sensitive escalation formula
brooklyn union said the gas from shell oil will replace about 25 % of the gas previously supplied by transco energy inc's transcontinental gas pipe line corp subsidiary
the utility said transcontinental will transport the gas being purchased from shell oil, possibly beginning as soon as november 1
bp raises north sea butane prices british petroleum co plc said it raised its posted butane prices by 15.50 dollars per tonne to 123 dollars, fob north sea, effective today

cooper basin natural gas reserves upgraded remaining recoverable gas reserves in the areas held by the santos ltd-led cooper basin joint ventures have been upgraded to 2,721.7 billion cubic feet bcf from the 2,466 estimated last may, santos said
the upgrading followed a re-review by consultant coles nikiforuk pennell associates in light of the large number of gas finds since may 1986, santos said in a statement

british petroleum plc left propane unchanged at 110 dollars and raised butane prices 5.50 dollars to 123 dollars, shell, a unit of royal dutch/shell group raised propane three dollars to 113 and butane 5.50 dollars to 123 dollars, they said
houston-based shell oil co, a unit of royal dutch/shell group , has been one of the most active companies in buying and selling reserves, smith said
since 1982, shell has acquired two billion dollars in new reserves, including 470 million barrels of oil equivalent at a net cost of 2.80 dollars a barrel, he said

santos bids for oil and gas company tmoc resources cooper basin oil producer santos ltd said it will bid 4.00 dollars a share for the 96.03 % it does not already hold in diversified oil and gas company tmoc resources ltd
santos said the bid values tmoc at 248.5 million dollars

tmoc held interests outside the cooper basin region of south australia and queensland and the acquisition would further the santos objective of developing as a broadly based oil and gas company with interests outside its existing base in the cooper basin, the company said in a statement
santos said tmoc holds several important domestic oil and gas production, exploration and pipeline interests
tmoc also holds 25 % of the jackson to moonie oil pipeline, 20 % owned by santos
output from the naccowlah block, 40 % owned by santos, provides the bulk of the throughput of both pipelines
it also has oil and gas interests in britain's north sea, ecuador, and the u.s., along with gold and base metal production through its associate paringa mining and exploration co plc, santos said
other interest holders in the kerna four well are: santos ltd 50 %, delhi 30, vamgas ltd 10, south australian oil and gas corp pty ltd 10 %

santos says profits hit by oil price fall leading australian onshore oil and gas producer, santos ltd, said its 1986 results were hit by sharp reductions in prices for crude oil, condensate and liquefied petroleum gas

santos chairman sir brian massy-greene said in a statement that increased production, particularly of oil and lpg, along with reduced operating costs and reduced or deferred oil exploration and development outlays, were helping santos deal with an adverse business climate

santos said it remained financially strong with an injection of 84 million dollars from the second instalment of a 1985 rights issue, and had cash reserves of 381.3 million dollars at the end of 1986 against 401.9 million a year earlier
santos yesterday announced a 4.00 dollar a share takeover bid for the 96.93 % it did not already hold in oil and gas company tmoc resources ltd -- valuing the target at 248.5 million dollars
santos said 75 % of its loans were u.s

santos said it had a successful gas exploration program, finding 172 billion cubic feet in south australia, but oil exploration was less successful with 1.62 million barrels added to reserves -- less than depletion during the year
cooper basin producers are committed to a two-year scheme to double gas exploration while santos said its 1987 budget for oil exploration had been boosted 20 %
santos said the outlook for 1987 depended on prices and production volumes but with extra oil exploration and encouraging gas finds there were grounds for optimism
the oil companies, amoco corp, arco, exxon corp, mobil corp, sohio, shell, texaco inc and union oil, had said that voiding previously granted leases would result in staggering financial losses
lower tax offsets lower shell u.k
upstream profit shell u.k
ltd's pre-tax profit on exploration and production operations fell to 869 million stg in 1986 from 2.12 billion in 1985 due to the fall in oil prices last year, shell u.k
earlier, shell u.k., a subsidiary of royal dutch/shell group, reported an overall net profit of 757 million stg, up from 667 million in 1985, on sales of 6.57 billion stg against 8.81 million
shell u.k
shell expects a fall in output of around 10 % in the current year to around 340,000 bpd, due mainly to the decline in output from the major brent field, he said
jaap klootwijk, managing director of downstream unit shell u.k

a new catalytic cracker at shell's stanlow refinery will now come on stream by the end of first quarter 1988, about five months behind schedule, following a crane accident which severely damaged the plant last year, he said
